org.springframework.context

接口 ApplicationListener<E extends ApplicationEvent>

  • 类型参数:
    E - the specific ApplicationEvent subclass to listen to
    所有超级接口:
    java.util.EventListener
    所有已知子接口:
    GenericApplicationListener, SmartApplicationListener
    所有已知实现类:
    ApplicationListenerMethodAdapter, DefaultSimpUserRegistry, GenericApplicationListenerAdapter, JmsListenerEndpointRegistry, MultiServerUserRegistry, ResourceUrlProvider, ResourceUrlProvider, ScheduledAnnotationBeanPostProcessor, SourceFilteringListener, UserRegistryMessageHandler
    函数接口:
    这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ApplicationListener<E extends ApplicationEvent>
extends java.util.EventListener
    Interface to be implemented by application event listeners. Based on the standard java.util.EventListener interface for the Observer design pattern.

    As of Spring 3.0, an ApplicationListener can generically declare the event type that it is interested in. When registered with a Spring ApplicationContext, events will be filtered accordingly, with the listener getting invoked for matching event objects only.

    作者:
    Rod Johnson, Juergen Hoeller
    另请参阅:
    ApplicationEventMulticaster

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onApplicationEvent(E event)
      Handle an application event.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onApplicationEvent

        void onApplicationEvent(E event)
        Handle an application event.
        参数:
        event - the event to respond to
